Smart Problem Solvers

We love to solve problems. It’s what we do. It’s what we are known for. Technology is the vehicle that we use to solve your business challenges.

Smart solutions. Smart processes. Smart protocols.

That’s who we are and what we do.

Our Team

“We won’t give you jargon or buzzwords. Just results.”

Mind Over Data is a winning team, comprised of experienced, creative, talented, enthusiastic professionals who take pride in the quality of their work and inspire innovation. Our team represents a diverse skill set, and maintains a philosophical integrity that produces positive working relationships.

Our Story

Code doesn’t solve problems. Smart people with code do.

We are problem solvers first and foremost. We have an insatiable drive to find a better way. Never satisfied with “good enough” we are always asking: how can we make this better, faster, stronger so our clients can go further. We stand behind every solution we develop, and when your business grows or changes, we can modify the solution to meet your developing needs.

We are equippers. In fact, our success hinges on your partnership. While we supply the tools, techniques, and experience - it's your vision that provides content for the solution. Technology is a tool to help you carry out business - nothing more and nothing less. If we are going to get the right solution, the right way, the first time, you must have a voice at the table. Many service providers will charge you an arm and a leg for what amounts to reinventing the wheel. At Mind Over Data, our only goal is to improve your business in the most efficient, economical way possible - not lock you into (or out of) a nonproductive technical solution. We will never leave you in the dark.

We are communicators who won’t withhold info or talk over your head. Once a relationship begins with Mind Over Data, the partnership extends far beyond the everyday solution — Mind Over Data will continue to offer technical and development support to help your business grow into the future. We don't hand you alphabet soup, we give you collaborative solutions that work for your business.

As focused problem-solvers who thrive in high-pressure, high-stakes endeavors – tackling business issues is our playground. Our recreation consists of delivering accurate numbers, elegantly designing workflows, crafting clean code, assembling elaborate elements of high-tech hardware, and devising eye-popping animations and interfaces. We enjoy what we do. We thrive on it.

And when you have passion for something, it’s more than a living, it’s a way of life.

Get in Touch

Are you ready to stop wasting time (and money) with off-the-shelf technology that keeps missing the mark? We couple your experience with our expertise to develop common-sense tailored solutions that get the job done.
